content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
The Legend will never die. Heralded as one of the best fighting games of all-time, SOULCALIBUR®II returns to consoles with crisp new high definition graphics and all-new online modes in celebration of its 10 year anniversary.

SOULCALIBUR®II HD ONLINE re-imagines the weapon-based 3D fighter by adding online multiplayer support to the title as well as vibrant updated graphics to take advantage of modern high definition TVs.

For the first time ever, players will be able to square off against opponents from around the world with their favorite SOULCALIBUR characters such as Ivy or Voldo. Also included are the two original exclusive guest characters, Todd McFarlane's Spawn and Heihachi Mishima from the TEKKEN™ series.

1-2 players
HDTV screen resolution: 720p
DUALSHOCK®3
Network Features
Network Players 2-2

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item. This item may be used with up to 2 activated PlayStation®3 systems associated with this Sony Entertainment Network account.
